Pre-Game Insights: Flames have every reason to be optimistic going into the match against Tunisia after a 1-0 victory over Liberia
The Flames will be looking to maintain their perfect start in the qualifiers and utilise home advantage against Tunisia
The Flames, who arrived on Sunday afternoon from Liberia, will have to shrug off jetlag after travelling for 24 hours from Liberia via Ghana, Addis Ababa in Ethiopia to Malawi
Heading into the tie, the Flames should look beyond the Carthage Eaglesâ€™ status and avoid being intimidated by their previous achievements
The two teams are separated by 91 places on the Fifa rankings, with the Flames on 123 whereas Carthage Eagles are on position 32 in the world
Others: The Flames are third with three points, behind Tunisia on goal difference who defeated Sao Tome and Principe 4-0. Equatorial Guinea are second with three points as well
